topic.title: Create cluster reference
topic.shortdesc: Cluster reference sets the cluster name, IP or hostname, administrator credentials and encryption.

body.p: To create a cluster reference using the Couchbase Web Console:

ol.li: Go to XDCR Create Cluster Reference

Provide the following information for identifying and accessing the destination cluster.
Cluster Name: Name of the cluster you are adding.
IP/hostname: IP address or hostname of a node in the cluster you are adding.
Security: Username and password or the login credentials for the remote cluster.
Enable encryption: If you select this option, XDCR data encryption occurs using SSL. A window will open where you have to paste the SSL certificate that you obtained from the remote cluster. This certificate is available on the remote cluster on the location Settings Cluster .

ul.li: Do not share the certificate with any unintended entities.
Regenerate the certificate periodically based on your organizational requirements.

body.note: It is recommended to conduct traffic for XDCR using a Virtual Private Network (VPN).
